Click or badge in to choose loser
Click or badge in to choose winner
No games recorded. Record a game to see rankings.
No games recorded. Record a game to see history.

Icon Sources

Large Boss Icon Set is by aha-soft.

Buddy, Dress IT, and Persons icon sets by iconka.

Animal Icons by Martin Berube.

Pool ball icons by barkerbaggies (Marc Heatley).

Monster Icons by IconShock.

African Pets, Animal Toys, Art Toys, Creatures Variety, Creature Cutes, and Dinosaur icon sets by fasticon; used under license.

Buuf, SuperBuuf, UltraBuuf, MicroGant, MiniGant, and Osmu icon sets by Mattahan; licensed under Creative Commons.

Other Graphics

Font Awesome by Dave Gandy http://fontawesome.io.

Standard Android action icons are reproduced from work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Action bar styles from Jeff Gilfelt\'s Action Bar Style Generator.

Audio

Scoreboard sound effects from http://www.freesfx.co.uk. Fanfare from bone666138 on freesound.org.
